```{r, echo=F, include = F}
bsCombined <- bsCombined[,bsCombined$state != "Cancer" | is.na(bsCombined$state)]
#Get Cov and meth
gr <- rowRanges(bsCombined)
cov <- getCoverage(bsCombined, type = "Cov")
meth <- getCoverage(bsCombined, type = "M")
meth_vals <- meth /cov
colnames(meth_vals) <- colData(bsCombined)$names
mcols(gr) <- meth_vals

#Make windows
cl <- bumphunter::clusterMaker(seqnames(bsCombined), start(bsCombined))

gr$DMR <- cl

#use plyranges
gr_dmr <- gr %>% 
  group_by(DMR) %>% 
  summarise_at(
    colnames(meth_vals), mean, na.rm=TRUE) %>%
  as.matrix()
 
#Transform
methsTR <- asin(2*gr_dmr[,-1]-1)
m3 <- limma::plotMDS(methsTR, dim.plot=c(1,3), top = 10000, labels = colnames(meth_vals))
```

Red: Adenoma  
Blue: cecum_old  
Green: cecum_young  
Purple: Normal_Adenoma  
Orange: Normal_SSA  
Yellow: sigmoid_old     
Brown: sigmoid_young   
Pink: SSA

```{r, echo=FALSE}
myColor <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(8, "Set1")[c(2,3,4,5,6,7)]
m3cmds <- m3$cmdscale.out
par3d(cex=1)
plot3d(x = m3cmds[,1], y = m3cmds[,2], z = m3cmds[,3], xlab = "1", ylab = "2", zlab = "3", 
       col = myColor[as.factor(colData(bsCombined)$lesion)], type="p", size=10)
```
